scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && cp -r src/views dist
scripts.build: npm run build:markups & npm run build:scripts & npm run build:images & npm run build:styles
scripts.build:markups: for file in src/*.html; do html-minifier -o ${file/src/dist} --remove-comments --remove-comments-from-cdata --collapse-whitespace --minify-js --minify-css $file; done
scripts.build:styles: mkdir dist/css && for file in src/css/*.css; do cleancss -o ${file/src/dist} $file; done
scripts.build:scripts: mkdir dist/js && for file in src/js/*.js; do uglifyjs $file -o ${file/src/dist}; done
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:markups' 'npm run watch:styles' 'npm run watch:scripts' 'npm run watch:images'
scripts.dev: parallelshell 'npm run livereload' 'npm run serve' 'npm run open' 'npm run watch'
